Greek Fast Food Restaurant For Sale - Irvine, California
Ad/Listing Information
Status: Off The Market Location: Irvine County: Orange City: Irvine
Financial Information Detailed Information Price: $125,000 Down: $85,000 Revenue: $260,000 Adj. Net: $78,000
Relocatable: No Home Based: No Real Estate Included: No Bkr To Bkr Coop: Call
Franchise: No For Sale By Owner: No Asset Sale: No Lifestyle: No
Description Of This Irvine Greek Fast Food Restaurant Business For Sale: Very popular Greek and Mediterranean Fast Food. This restaurant is located by a very good mix of businesses and apartment buildings ( residential neighborhood).
They serve a mix of Gyro, and Kabobs with a variety of fresh salads.
Available seating for 110. Inside and outside seating. This restaurant shares its seating area with two other restaurants in the center. Great food and great following. They cater to businesses and private parties.
Business used to do a very healthy business at night time as a Hookah Bar. Sales surpassed 40K a month.
The seller is older and was not able to continue working both days and nights. All Hookah equipment is ready and the Tobacco license is valid.
Seller is motivated.
